item.description:
Join us to see this movie which has been a huge hit in France and around the world!  Here is more info on the movie:    amherstcinema.org/films-and-events/intouchables

Meet in theater lobby at 6:45 if you want to sit together.  As always, it's a good idea to purchase your ticket beforehand.  You can purchase at the box office or online here:

boxoffice.printtixusa.com/amherst/movies?v=2963

Leave a comment on your RSVP if you'd like to get together beforehand to chat in French - if a few people would like to we can meet at Amherst Coffee around the corner.

See you then!
item.name: Soiree Cinema: Les Intouchables
